item.description:
We'll continue the good work we accomplished last workday. You can read the report at "past meetups" for 6/9. On Sat 6/23 we'll hike a mile up the trail and work our way downhill. The usual prep applies: BYO work gloves, lunch, 3 qt H2O (leave 1 in car for after); tools and dark chocolate supplied. We'll work till midafternoon, total time about 6 hrs.

It really is fun to see how much we can improve a trail in the few hours we work there. Trailwork adds a whole new dimension to your appreciation of a hike.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: West side trails Mt Cardigan: erosion control = steps, barricades, drainage.
